title: Reflective Tool-Based Education for Strengthening Religious Character

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of religious values and self-reflection experience
context.additional_context: Blended online platform and in-person instruction offering personalized reflective programs through religious character assessment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically diagnose strengths and weaknesses in religious character traits.
Learners can establish personalized growth plans based on reflective tool results.
Learners can expand religious values through peer feedback in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
